title: Started a Research Assistant position at Boston University, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering.
The paper "Improving Scene Graph Classification by Exploiting Knowledge from Texts" has been accepted to the 36th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence.
The paper "Classification by Attention: Scene Graph Classification with Prior Knowledge" has been accepted to the 35th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence.
The paper "Improving Visual Relation Detection using Depth Maps" has been accepted to International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR 2020).
A new Vehicle Recognition web page with a Tensorflow.js demonstration has been launched: www.sinabaharlou.com/VehicleRecognition.
The paper "Transfer learning approach for classification and noise reduction on noisy web data" is published on the journal of Expert Systems with Applications (ESWA).
Graduated from Sapienza University of Rome.
